service

Class GameServiceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.GameServiceTest

  • public class GameServiceTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This Junit Test Class will have all the test cases for GameService class.
    Author:
    Yogesh

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Continent> continentList
      It hold collection of all the continents in game in list.
      private java.util.HashSet<Continent> continentsSet
      It hold collection of all the continents in game in set.
      private GameService gameService
      To hold GameService class instance.
      private java.util.HashSet<Territory> territoriesSet
      It hold collection of all the territory in game in set.
      private java.util.List<Territory> territoryList
      It hold collection of all the territories in game in list.

      GameServiceTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      This method setup require common context before every test is run.
      void testAddReinforcement()
      This test checks if the GameService#addReinforcement() method add correct number of reinforcement armies to current player's selected territory
      void testAssignTerritories()
      This method test if GameService.assignTerritories(List) assigns territories to players or not.
      void testAttack()
      This test checks if the GameService#attack(Territory, Territory) method attack given territory or not.
      void testCalcArmiesForReinforcementCaseOne()
      This method is use to test the functionality of GameService.calcArmiesForReinforcement(Player) method that whether it calculate armies for a given player as per game rules or not when player occupy whole continent..
      void testCalcArmiesForReinforcementCaseTwo()
      This method is use to test the functionality of GameService.calcArmiesForReinforcement(Player) method that whether it calculate armies for a given player as per game rules or not when player doesn't occupy whole continent.
      void testCanPlayerAttackFurther()
      This test check if the method GameService#canPlayerAttackFurther() returns correct boolean based on if current player can attack further or not
      void testCreatePlayers()
      This method test GameService.createPlayers(List, int) method which should populate playerList which is passed as one of the argument with as many players as denoted by numberOfplayers argument.
      void testEndOfReinforcementPhase()
      This method checks if the GameService.endOfReinforcementPhase(Player, CardExchangeViewModel) method return correct result or not.
      void testEndOfStartUpPhase()
      This test checks if the GameService#endOfStartUpPhase() method returns valid boolean to check if the startUp phase is completed or not.
      void testFortifyCaseOne()
      This test checks if the GameService.fortify(Territory, Territory, int, List) method fortify given territory according to game logic and after proper validation or not when armies to move is greater than from territory army count.
      void testFortifyCaseTwo()
      This test checks if the GameService.fortify(Territory, Territory, int, List) method fortify given territory according to game logic and after proper validation or not when from territory try to move armies to itself.
      void testGetAttackableTerritories()
      This test checks if the GameService.getAttackableTerritories(Territory) method returns valid attackable territories according to given territory and according to game rule.
      void testGetFortifiableTerritories()
      This test checks if the GameService.getFortifiableTerritories(Territory) method returns valid fortifiable territories according to given territory and according to game rule.
      void testGetNextPlayer()
      This test checks if the GameService#getNextPlayer() method returns valid player whose turn it is as per round robin fashion for choosing player turn
      void testIfContinentOccupied()
      This test check if the method GameService#ifContinentOccupied() returns correct boolean based on if current player occupies all the territories of the continent and hence occupies the continent.
      void testIsGameEnded()
      This method test logic for GameService.isGameEnded(Player, int) method.
      void testValidateArmyInput()
      This test case is for GameService.validateArmyInput(String, Player, Territory, List) method where we test to various cases where method validates given parameters as per logic.
      void testValidateSelectedDiceNumber()
      This method will test whether the values entered by user for number of dice roll for attacker and defender are valid or not.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
